events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately as this is not what I paid for.
The customer's message contains keywords related to refund, so the case has been categorized under Refund.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello! I am sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I will be happy to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item so we can process your refund quickly?
Thank you for your prompt reply. My order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item I received.
We have reviewed your photo and verified the error. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate your quick handling of this refund and look forward to receiving it soon.
The refund has been processed successfully and your case is now resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Feel free to reach out anytime!
Since your refund was properly received and you did not report any further issues, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service!
